game.name: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard

about.short: A terrifying first-person survival horror game where Ethan Winters searches for his missing wife in a decaying Louisiana plantation.
about.full: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard redefines the franchise with a return to classic survival horror through a chilling first-person perspective. Players step into the shoes of Ethan Winters as he searches for his wife Mia in the Baker family estate. The game features atmospheric exploration, resource management, intense boss encounters, and escape-room style puzzles. Powered by the RE Engine, RE7 delivers photorealistic visuals and psychological horror, establishing a new era for the Resident Evil series.

game_mechanics: Found footage sequences that expand the story
feature_list: Return to classic survival horror roots
